We are a 4th generation, family owned leading supplier of kitchen and bath products. We realize that our people are our greatest asset and can guarantee that you won't get lost in the shuffle, we are committed to offering opportunities for growth and advancement. We empower our employees to build long-lasting careers with us.We are looking for motivated, energetic salespeople to develop durable relationships with trade professionals as well as retail customers.The Design Center Sales consultant will work with clients to select plumbing faucets and fixtures, as well as lighting and hardware. Sales Consultants are responsible for providing expert product selection, technical assistance and conduct customer visits as needed. You will utilize your unique creative capabilities in combination with excellent customer service skills in order to assist clients with product selection.Main Responsibilities* Work with a wide range of customers, including builders, designers, and homeowners, to sell a variety of products in the kitchen and bath fixtures category.* Provide a pleasant experience for clients while sharing product expertise and elevated service.* Manage and execute all stages of the sales process from opportunity, order entry, proper follow-up and customer satisfaction.* Develop knowledge of our product lines and stay current on changes in the products in order to provide customers with accurate product information, specs & pricing.* Identify and create new customers through building strong relationships with contractors, builders, retail customers etc.* Maintain a clean, welcoming and organized showroom appearance which will enhance sales**Qualifications*** To be successful in this role, you should have previous sales experience, a welcoming, customer-centric personality, and a genuine drive for reaching sales goals while developing yourself professionally.* 3+ years sales experience, preferably in the kitchen, bath & lighting or building materials industries preferred.* Strong sales aptitude, negotiation skills and demonstrated ability to build rapport with clients.* Proficient computer skills utilizing the Microsoft Office Suite of software with working knowledge of ERP systems, Eterm a plus.* Exceptional communication and organization skills with excellent attention to detail.* Must demonstrate maturity in judgement, commitment and dependability.* Available to work a flexible schedule including weekends. When you work a Saturday, you have a day off during the week.* Background in a design or other creative environment a plus.**Other:** Compensation is an hourly base wage paid weekly, and monthly commission based on sales.
